item.title: Ambience 639 - The good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy101 mikeyboy101
item.description:
@mikeyboy101 wrote:

Server has so much potential to be #1, but not a lot of players. Its one of the best RSPS’s I’ve played, so bring your friends and come join us.

Read full topic

item.title: Ambience 639 - The good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @musicmasta musicmasta
item.description:
@musicmasta wrote:

Here are some updates that have recently been added:
[pre]
Updated Dungeon Minigame, NPCs no longer attack outside of their dens.
Development begun on Quest Tab
Swap Books Interface Added, Change prayer and Magic Books.
Donations Completed, Purchasing Level 99 and Specific items is completely automated.
Corporeal Beast Fixed
Nex has been fixed
Prayer Altar has been added at home
Banking Glitch has been fixed

Added Vote points shop
Added vote points

Added and fixed a few things, fixed some bugs and glitches we find
Planning on the new quest

Making better ways to receive items
Fixing the Economy One by One

Tinkering with some more things to add more cut-scenes into the game maybe, for special quests we add
Adding more items into the game that people want to mess with

Possibly adding a timer to some items based on player definitions to add degradable weapons to reduce over-poweredness.
Updated the game as usual[/pre]

Vote Points Shop:

Prayer Altar Home:

Book Swapping:

Quest Tab

Control Panel:

Warriors Dungeon:

Multi-Way Combat Zones(The world is now split between multi-way combat and Non-Multi):

Read full topic

item.description:

Good luck regardless.[/quote]

Yeah, idk what’s going on with the high scores right now, been waiting to add them.

item.title: Ambience 639 - The good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

You might want to take your highscores webpage down or at least put an index.html in that directory so people can’t see your highscores files.

Good luck regardless.

item.title: Ambience 639 - The good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

Well people, after playing this server for a couple weeks i came to know one thing. This server is freaking awesome. Has its original stuff. And well scripted questst. (they actually made a big script before making the quest.) They spend alot time to make the server better. Wich i respect Dan for (roflmaodude1) He is like a non sleeping person to get the best out of this server.

Read full topic

item.title: Ambience 639 - The good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @roflmaodude1 roflmaodude1
item.description:
@roflmaodude1 wrote:

CoderOops:

looks awesome. 639 is my favorite. Too bad it is missing summoning:(

I’m not a fan of summoning personally XD. Also, added some more media. There’s so much to do idek what to put in the thread…

Read full topic

item.title: Ambience 639 - The good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @roflmaodude1 roflmaodude1
item.description:
@roflmaodude1 wrote:

lardain:

Lol i have a problem, I never recieved a verification link to activate my account. So i can`t play. Can you resend a verification link to the account “lardain”. Thank you, look forward to play this. Been waiting 3 days on the verification link now.

Hey, very sorry for the trouble. We are actually having some technical difficulties and I’m out of town so I don’t have access to my server files. If you have a skype please add me: musicmasta and I’ll keep you updated on everything, we will make sure your account is activated right away seeing that you’re clearly not a bot lol. But uhm yeah again, if you have a skype add me: musicmasta if not just pay attention to this thread I’ll post an update when we’re functioning again.

Edit: Sorry about the issues connecting lately, they’ve been fixed and the server’s now back up.

Read full topic
